title: Found an Unlisted Xayah/Rakan Gifting Error
body: Just can't figure it out, man.

replies.body:
It looks like for a short time after their initial release, we were having some problems getting Rakan and Xayah gifted out with IP. We've gotten most of it ironed out at this point, but it looks like a few feathers are still ruffled. 

We've seen some players getting errors like this when the person they were sending the gift to already owned that champion. Double check that your friend hasn't bought them yet! Also, I know my response is a little late, but let me know if you're still having issues sending that gift and we'll get right on it!
He hasn't bought or received it so far, and I'm still getting this error.
Hmmmm that is odd then. Go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can look into this for you!
